reviews.review: Só trava e mal otimizado, porém amo
This game is terribly balanced, has a toxic community and makes me angry. It's my favorite game and has Consumed my life. 0/0.
game sucks but blight is fun

Pretty fun, especially if you're a horror movie fan. The game loop is interesting and fun, there are different ways to play for both survivor and killer. And while I still am having a lot of good experiences with the game, I can see myself losing interest in a month or two down the line. Crossplay is also a feature if you've got friends on console, thrilling and funny at times if you've got a buddy or two. Get it on sale and you won't be disappointed. 
My advice as a consumer would be for them to add a new gamemode or two. There doesn't have to be much else, just a couple of ways to spice things up and keep it fresh.

This game itself is good and fun, but I would not recommend this game for new players especially if you gonna play this game solo. This game is known to have an imbalance matchmaking issue. As a new player, you should expect to up against 15 yo toxic kid with 500+ in-game hours with superior rank and different kinda perks that require long hours grinding. To be able to catch up with the current meta you should have perks from characters which are only some available to buy with in-game currency (that require a lot of grinding of course) and definitely you need put hours into the game to grind for perks. it basically grinding inside grinding for those who own only the basic game. The first 50 hours was fun and thrilling but at this rate, I did not know anymore whether I having fun or not
high replayability. still scary. love it

Dead by daylight will make your heart beat and you will feel the tension when sneaking around or getting chased by a raving psycopath. An amazing survival horror experience and my favourite indie game so far this year.

As a whole, the game is fantastic. There are few games that try to compete with Dead by Daylight in the asymmetrical PvP genre, and fewer that actually are still around. So let's list some pros and cons:
Pros -
- Killers are well designed both visually and mechanically with some rare exceptions.
- Licensed killers are simply fun to see/play such as Ghostface, Freddy Kruegar, Michael Myers, and Pyramid Head.
- Perk variety allows for many builds to flourish and adapt to the play style of the player, or simply pile onto a gimmick and become a meme.
- Maps have a nice variety due to procedural generation based on pre-generated tile sets, allowing for multiple matches on the same map to have differing lay outs while still retaining some familiarity for strategic gameplay.
- The "Shrine of Secrets" allows players to potentially unlock perks from characters they do not own on a list that rotates weekly. This allows patient players to unlock specific perks without having to purchase said character just for the perk.

Cons -
- Mechanically there is little to no difference between all the survivors so choosing one over the other is pointless (which can also be a good thing maybe?)
- While most killers/survivors can be unlocked with in game currency, the licensed characters (Freddy, Myers, Ghostface, etc.) can only be purchased either with a paid currency or by buying their respective DLC bundle, which can lead to some killers being seen as "pay to win".
- Let's just get this out of the way: The developers are pretty deaf to their community and don't exactly listen to what we want. They more often than not cater to survivors over killers and it causes some parts of the community to become especially toxic. In patch 4.5.0, they redesigned the HUD and survivor walk animations entirely despite there being no need for it, and when the community gave them overwhelmingly negative feedback they still pushed it to live servers.
- Matchmaking is a nightmare as "Survive With Friends" effectively lets a rank 20 (low rank) queue with their rank 1 (high rank) friend and be paired against killers that are typically around rank 10 which causes much grief to the killer as they get paired with players that are above their skill level. SWF also introduces other issues of external communication which allows them to coordinate strategies effectively. Normally communication isn't a problem but with Dead by Daylight, it's not intended and can disrupt gameplay balance in matches. The result is survivors having to wait (at least) 15-20 minutes to find a match because there are so few people playing killer.

While the cons seem like they would outweigh the pros, the overall experience is honestly great and you end up learning to live with the cons as most do.

7.5/10 With good patches the game excels, with bad ones it's nauseating.

I do not reccomand this game its way to toxic it aint even fun playing. If you are a kill most of the time survivors are spamming you with the pallets and with the vaults. Хорошая игра. Интересный геймплей. Только разрабы фиксят всё очень долго. 
 
Поиграл еще 100 часов. Много проблем с пробитиями в паллетах, когда ты давно уже ее перелез, а тебя как ни в чем не бывало просто бьют по спине. Очень раздражает. Такая же штука происходит и с окнами, в которые тебя тоже без особого труда пробивают. Есть баг с тысячью блинков в руках нюрсы, который очень бесит. Есть карты, на которых попросту не хочется играть, такие как Хэддонфилд, Подземный комплекс, Институт Лэри или какая-нибудь Начальная школа Мидвича. На этих картах играется очень сложно, так как они зарытые, на них хрен побегаешь.

Самое главное, нужно пофиксить постараться проблемы с пробитиями. 
Всем мир.

The community isn't a community. It's a minefield of toxicity. If you try to say that it's unfair to use actual "tactics" that control the games end you're met with people who do not understand how to have fun. The game is full of bugs that break the game or just make it unjoyable. If you want a balanced game this is not for you. Either side has to work hard for their objective and the devs would rather listen to a potato than the people who give bug reports. 
It's essentially pay to win. All the DLC killers are OP (their perks mainly). Even survivors have that. 

Put your money into something better. Like anything else.
It´s an addictiv pain in the ass to play this. I recommond strongly to play it

I have been playing dbd for a while now i think from 2018 ish 2019 ish till now (obviously by my number of hours not constantly) but even tho its  a good concept and designed game with beautiful maps etc.,i can't stand the fact that after 4 years now,the bugs,hitboxes,broken add ons broken killer-perk combination and the maatchmaking experience and sooo many other bothering things that made me wanna play now like 4 games a week as a survivor cause i dont have the strong will to wait 10 minutes for a game just to get 4 party match up against only flashlight p3 claudettes....and if u kill one u are called toxic......With all of these ,DBD is a great skeleton of a game ,it has soo many flaws and tbh it seems like from the big boom in popularity ,BHVR instead of listening to the old og s community ,they pump up more and more cashgrabs like the dlc that are getting more and more expensive,with less shits to do...i mean the last fun  dlc from both survivor and killer POV is stranger things that's old now..... .
In conclusion, dbd its a fun game if u buy more dlc and perks to play with,if u get trought the bugs,hitboxes,toxic community of new kids etc...but for me without nothing new implemented and nothing new to toy with....i strongly disagree to buy DBD only if u have like 50 euros to do nothing with so u can put it here..cauase only the game o dlc no nothing...its just bad..and i m so so sad to say it but one of my favourite games became a cashgrab with greedy company behind it ad pay to win (in some cases) impossible to gt the full experience if u don't wanna waste money on it...so pls dont buy it go get better games.

데바데 핵은 쓰는 족족 검열되서 크게 상관은 없는데 문제는 늘어나는 짱깨 10 ㅅ ㅐ기들때문에 겜하는도중 지들끼리 단합해서 겜터질때까지 길막하고 잠수한다음 내가 죽으면 채팅창에 온갖 잡영어로 씨부리기 바쁜데 이런 짱깨가 10판에 2판은 걸림 짱깨 개 많고 가장큰 문제는 애새기들이 생존자만 쳐해대서 그런건지 데바데가 존1나 끝물이라 그런건지 생존자로 매칭한번 돌리면 15분 기본임 대기시간 15분 겜한판 15분 이게 게임이냐 ㅆ2발아

But no this half-assed game is so competitive they removed widescreen support. Bravo.

Also 45gig for what? Only skins and dlc's. Crysis has better graphics than this.
